org.raistlic.common.postcondition

Class Postcondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.raistlic.common.postcondition.Postcondition

  • public final class Postcondition
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is used as the entry point for post condition checks, it has utility methods for validation work, as well as some static factory methods that expose proper AssertionFactory instances for different types of objects.
